full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 Page 1 of 2 SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT Sponsor FOIA (b)(6) Name (PA) Address Number in case Telephon - Employer Contact #1 FOIA (b)(6) Contact #2 We are happy that you have agreed to assist in the sponsorship of refugees in the United States under the Refugee Resettlement Program. Catholic Social Services (USCC) has nothing to do with the selection for resettlement of refugees or with the time when they might arrive. We will contact you as soon as we receive any information from our New York office. We will also notify you when we receive arrival information. I agree to assist the refugee (s) as much as possible. Specifically, I agree to: 1. Keep Catholic Social Services (USCC) informed of my home and work telephone numbers and let them know when I plan to leave Atlanta for more than a few days. Yes No 2. Pick up the refugees at their point of arrival. Yes No 3. Provide housing for at least 3 week (s) after arrival. Yes No 4. Provide household goods. Yes No 5. Provide food for at least 3 week(s) after arrival. Yes No 1/87 MRS/RF-10 (added 2/87)
